name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

name: Blood Ogre
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Chandra's Outrage
oracle_text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

name: Compulsive Research
oracle_text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
flavor_text: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Doomed Traveler
oracle_text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

name: Excoriate
oracle_text: Exile target tapped creature.
flavor_text: The demon had flown past the reach of Erebos's whip but not the point of the sun god's spear.

name: Expedition Raptor
oracle_text:
Flying
When Expedition Raptor enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

name: Explore
oracle_text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

name: Fertilid
oracle_text:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

name: Fiery Fall
oracle_text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

name: Grasp of the Hieromancer
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls."
flavor_text:
"There is power in abandon, but far more in control."
—Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

name: Grixis Panorama
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Grixis Panorama: Search your library for a basic Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: There is no height above Grixis that is free from the stench of death.

name: Hammerhand
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

name: Ior Ruin Expedition
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Ior Ruin Expedition.
Remove three quest counters from Ior Ruin Expedition and sacrifice it: Draw two cards.

name: Khalni Heart Expedition
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition.
Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Moment of Heroism
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

name: Nightscape Familiar
oracle_text:
Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.

name: Obelisk of Grixis
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.
flavor_text: Like most features of Grixis, the obelisks that remain from the time of Alara now exist only for dark exploitation.

name: Searing Spear
oracle_text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

name: Shoulder to Shoulder
oracle_text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Sea Gate may have fallen, but we still stand. We still fight."
—Gideon Jura

name: Smoldering Spires
oracle_text:
Smoldering Spires enters the battlefield tapped.
When Smoldering Spires enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
{T}: Add {R}.

name: Sylvan Bounty
oracle_text:
Target player gains 8 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Vastwood Zendikon
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 6/4 green Elemental creature. It's still a land.
When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Vines of the Recluse
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: "The most elegant solutions are found in nature. You just have to know where to look."

name: Vision Skeins
oracle_text: Each player draws two cards.
flavor_text: "I could see in the other mage's eyes that he'd thought of it too. Then it became a race to exploit the knowledge first."

name: Windrider Eel
oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Windrider Eel gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The best spot to hook one is right behind the gills."
—Rana Cloudwake, kor skyfisher

name: Youthful Knight
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: Idealism fits him better than his armor.
